user_instruction: 'Send an email to Mary (mary.designer@freelancegraphics.com) with the necessary details for the book cover designs. You can check out my Gmail and The Editor'"'"'s Companion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Information Needed to Prepare Email to Mary for Book Cover Designs

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. To draft a complete email to Mary (mary.designer@freelancegraphics.com) about the upcoming book cover projects, could you please share the following?

• Design briefs or author notes for each title  
• Any reference images, sketches, or mood boards already discussed  
• Preferred dimensions, file formats, and print specs  
• Deadlines or key milestone dates  
• Brand or style guidelines (fonts, color palettes, imagery restrictions)  
• Any other instructions you’d like Mary to keep in mind

You mentioned the relevant details are in your Gmail threads and in “The Editor’s Companion.” If you could forward those messages or grant access to the pertinent sections, that would be perfect.

Once I have this information, I’ll compile everything and send Mary a clear, organized brief so she can get started right away.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]

final_output:
Subject: Information Needed to Prepare Email to Mary for Book Cover Designs

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. To draft a complete email to Mary (mary.designer@freelancegraphics.com) about the upcoming book cover projects, could you please share the following?

• Design briefs or author notes for each title  
• Any reference images, sketches, or mood boards already discussed  
• Preferred dimensions, file formats, and print specs  
• Deadlines or key milestone dates  
• Brand or style guidelines (fonts, color palettes, imagery restrictions)  
• Any other instructions you’d like Mary to keep in mind

You mentioned the relevant details are in your Gmail threads and in “The Editor’s Companion.” If you could forward those messages or grant access to the pertinent sections, that would be perfect.

Once I have this information, I’ll compile everything and send Mary a clear, organized brief so she can get started right away.

Thank you very much for your help!

Best regards,  
[Your Name]
